sense.def:
Površina, ki je
smooth
, ni groba in v njej ni lukenj.

seg.quote: The boulders were so smooth and slippery I couldn't get a grip.

sense.def:
Tekočina ali mešanica, ki je
smooth
, ne vsebuje grudic.

To smooth something
ali
to smooth something out
pomeni potegniti z roko prek nečesa, da postane gladko in ravno.

seg.quote: Don't iron pyjamas. Just smooth and fold them.
He turned his head and smoothed back the hair over one temple.

sense.def:
Gibanje ali dogajanje je
smooth
, kadar poteka enakomerno, brez nenadnih sprememb ali prekinitev.

seg.quote: He walked with a long, smooth stride.
The snake glides smoothly towards it.

sense.def:
Izraz
smooth
pomeni tudi uspešen in brez težav.

seg.quote: Cooperation is essential if you are going to lead a smooth existence in the office.
Life is running smoothly for them.

sense.def:
Kdor je
smooth
, je zelo urejene zunanjosti, samozavesten in vljuden.

To smooth over a problem or difficulty
pomeni zmanjšati težavo ali zaplet, zlasti tako, da govorimo s prizadetimi ljudmi.

seg.quote: I tried to smooth over the awkwardness of this first meeting.
